objective1: To bring value to your software project in the form of ease, fun, teamwork, knowledge of architecture, standards and best practices and work ethic with integroty
objective2: I don't bring my ego to projects and although I bring and share lots of ideas, I never push; I am always looking for balance and for clues in the team and in the environment to show the way forward.
objective3: I strive towards a balance between creative innovation and disciplined project management in a way that is appropriate for each project.
objective4: I enjoy applying what I know on the job but also stretching myself to learn new things and I excel at learning new technologies and applying them.
